statements: UPDATE peer_review_data SET completion_status = 'Approved' WHERE review_id = 1;
UPDATE peer_review_data SET reviewer_username = 'Alice', completed_date = '2023-08-10' WHERE review_id = 2;
UPDATE peer_review_data SET completion_status = 'Pending' WHERE review_id = 1001;
UPDATE peer_review_data SET completed_date = '2023-10-15', completion_status = 'Completed' WHERE reviewer_username = 'Alice';
UPDATE peer_reviews SET review_score = 5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE reviewers SET reviews_completed = reviews_completed + 1, expertise = 'Technical' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE peer_reviews SET review_score = 85, review_completion_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE id = 123;
UPDATE reviewers SET reviews_completed = reviews_completed + 1, name = 'Jane Doe', email = 'jane.doe@example.com' WHERE id = 456;
UPDATE PeerReviewCompletionRates SET completion_rate = 0.85 WHERE reviewer_id = 1 AND paper_id = 3;
UPDATE ReviewerPerformance SET avg_rating = 4.2, total_reviews = 25 WHERE reviewer_id = 5;
UPDATE PeerReviewCompletionRates SET completion_rate = 0.85 WHERE reviewer_id = 1 AND paper_id = 10;
UPDATE CustomizableReports SET report_description = 'Performance report for Q2' WHERE report_id = 4 AND report_name = 'Quarterly Performance';

UPDATE reviewers SET name = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 2
